        Create order using Pizza, anzahl, surname, firstname, street, streetnumber, livingplace and phonenumber
        Parameters:
        pizza - name of the Pizza (reference)
        anzahl - amount of Pizzas
        name - name of the Pizza
        vorname - firstname of the customer
        strasse - street of the customer
        nummer - streetnumber of the customer
        ort - livingplace of the customer
        telefon - phonenumber of the customer

        created Bestellung in database

        java.lang.Exception - ex when creating Bestellung
